game.name: CARNEDGE
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: CARNEDGE is a dark fantasy RPG where you drag the Eternal Flame across a dying world. Build deadly decks, summon weird allies, and fight through twisted dungeons full of enemies that hate your guts and watch chaos unfold!
game.shortDescriptionEn: CARNEDGE is a dark fantasy RPG where you drag the Eternal Flame across a dying world. Build deadly decks, summon weird allies, and fight through twisted dungeons full of enemies that hate your guts and watch chaos unfold!
